Gallery.title: Beautiful moments in Palermo
Gallery.description: From hearty meals to joyful gatherings â€“ browse through our memories and feel at home.

About.title: Welcome to Palermos Heart
About.description: Palermo: More than a restaurant, it's a meeting place where stories come alive. In the heart of Uppsala, we serve dishes crafted with love, from perfect pizzas to delightful drinks. Each visit is an experience, each meal more than just food. Welcome to a world of cherished memories. Welcome home, welcome to Palermo.

MenuPage.title: Menu
MenuPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
